programme.desc: Fermentation, Alcohol & beverages: Human migration led to the spread of amazing practices in many parts of the world. People migrated with the treasure of these practices and shared them with other races. Pablo learned more about this diverse country India as he dug through the practices in North East brought by people from countries like Tibet, Burma, Laos, Vietnam.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted S1E3
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay travels down the Mekong River in Laos, Southeast Asia on an adventure to unlock the secrets of its cuisine.

programme.title: Access 360 World Heritage S2E8
programme.desc: Beneath the ancient castles and cathedrals of Prague is a hidden underworld that traces the story of this World Heritage through the ages. But time and the forces of nature are threatening to destroy what's survived for over a thousand years. Now, teams of explorers, engineers and master craftsmen must go inside Prague's secret spaces to safeguard its cherished heritage.

programme.title: Climbing The Property Ladder E3
programme.desc: First time property developer Cate and her fiancee Nikki are looking to boost their pension pot and they carry out a high risk strategy by pouring all of Cate's life savings into a rundown house they don't even own. Will her dream of making a £200,000 profit turn into a nightmare?

programme.title: Fish Of The Day S3E5
programme.desc: Clarke has a good look at one of the most productive harbours in New Zealand. Home to over 20% of the world's seabird biodiversity and with a resident whale population, this unique location is an incredible harbinger of life. Clarke explores some of the harbours hidden features and shows a fishing club that has made big changes to better utilize the ocean around it.

programme.title: Fish Of The Day S3E6
programme.desc: Chasing a Dog Tooth Tuna, Clarke encounters everything but as he tackles the waters off Apia Island, Samoa. Not that he has any complaints as he manages to hook the largest Giant Trevally he has ever captured. He also gets in the water to discover that Samoa has some incredible spearfishing in the warm clear tropical waters that surround it.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce India S2E11
programme.desc: David finally fulfills his dream of visiting the Golden Temple, the holiest Sikh gurudwara in the world. The langar inside the Golden Temple, where the community comes and cooks together, serves upwards of 100,000 people a day and David gets to experience the mania of the meal preparation firsthand. Later, David takes a local food tour to sample all of the local Punjabi delicacies.

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Island Feast E9
programme.desc: The island of Rarotonga in the Cook Islands provides Chef Peter Kuruvita with not only spectacular vistas but also unique opportunities to learn from friendly locals on how to hunt and gather native fare.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces S8E3
programme.desc: The home of the nation's most inventive small spaces continues as George travels to Lancashire to meet Billy, a remarkable 17 year old self-builder who singlehandedly transforms a derelict narrow boat his mum bought for £4000 into a hand crafted floating holiday home for his mum and sister, and the results are amazing.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal E20
programme.desc: Pablo's belief that magic happens in the most unexpected places was just reaffirmed after this trip to the North East of India. Discovering ingredients and flavors that he had never heard of, never tasted or never even imagined existed came into his way. To add to all of this, the wonderful people of North East left no stone unturned to open their hearts and kitchens for Pablo.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal E19
programme.desc: Food has always been a way to spread joy and happiness for Pablo. When he got a chance to return the favour, Pablo couldn't think of a better way than to cook for the people of North East and share the magic of food with them. Pablo talks about his most innovative dishes given the limited amount of time and unusual ingredients, he churned out some amazing recipes in the North East of India.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted S1E4
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to the remote corners of New Zealand's South Island on an adventure to discover the secrets of Maori cuisine.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E6
programme.desc: Dr. Larry Kawa's office doubles as an orthodontics practice and a multi-aquarium showcase featuring all kinds of rare marine life. Living Color is commissioned to replace the physical tank, and also provide a unique underwater specimen to display. Mat and Francis are stumped and have to dig deep to come up with what is known as a Mermaid's Purse.

programme.title: Japan's Wild Year
programme.desc: Japan is synonymous with crowded high tech cities. In fact around three-quarters of Japan is uninhabited forests, mountains and coast lines. Here a great diversity of wildlife ekes out an existence adapted to a country with great extremes of climate. From the tropics in the south to the sub-arctic climate of Hokkaido island. From the northernmost primates in the world, the snow monkeys, bears, giant hornets and the weird goat-antelope serow, to the iconic red-headed crane and the abundant cherry salmon, the life blood of Japanese rivers.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn Compilations E1
programme.desc: Around the world, nighttime is a time of terror. In Indonesia, a bat struggles to climb past a vanguard of vipers to reach the safety of her colony. In Southern India, a mother bandicoot rat must outswim a cobra and crocodiles to find food for her babies. And in the rainforests of Costa Rica, darkness means a deadly free-for-all. Who will survive the horrors of night long enough to see the day, and who will be dead by dawn?

programme.title: World's Deadliest Crocs
programme.desc: Big crocs are watching us. Following our boats, learning our moves. They're smart, hungry? And massive. How big can they get? And what gives them the taste for human flesh? Who are the World's Deadliest Crocs? Through croc attack stories/re-cres we explore the latest behaviors and status of the BIG 4 croc species around the world.

programme.title: Fishing For Giants E1
programme.desc: Extreme angler, Andy Coetzee has travelled the world in search of the most elusive fish on the planet. But a few big fish still elude him - the Nile perch is on his red list. Catching one of these legendary monsters will quite possibly be the highlight of his fishing career. But that's easier said than done - its habitat is as wild as the fishing stories that surround it. Andy will need his lifetime of experience to succeed but he's ready to risk it all to fulfill his dream.

programme.title: Fishing For Giants E3
programme.desc: Extreme angler Andy Coetzee, has travelled the world in search of the largest, wiliest and most elusive fish on the planet, but a few big fish still elude him - the Guinean Giant Barracuda is one of them. Andy's epic quest plunges him into deepest, darkest Africa to find the scariest and most dangerous fish of them all. A fish that's worthy of horror movies. Catching one is exhillarating... but landing it can be life-threatening. A whirlwind of teeth and hooks in a confined space, they don't go down without a brutal struggle.

programme.title: Lion Kingdom E2
programme.desc: The Glade is a paradise where there is always water, a place where strange things happen. As the dry continues in Ruaha, herds of elephants arrive in the Glade. They dig deep into the sand with their trunks to tap the cleanest waters. The Glade pride copy the elephants - unusual behavior, but not in the Glade. Life carries on in its idiosyncratic way, but soon things may change. Adult male lions are on the horizon, they're following the buffalo. The Njaa pride have already spotted the males. The Njaa are drifters, they consider the buffalo their territory. But even these fearless lionesses will not hunt while the lions are about - and now the males are on their way to the Glade.

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends S5E2 ?
programme.desc: This episode features a dairy goat nursing and protecting a motherless foal. They share hay and drink together every day like a family. A parrot and a boxer cuddle and stay side-by-side without apprehension. These unlikely pals will definitely leave you in sheer amazement.

programme.title: Alaska Animal Rescue E2
programme.desc: It's springtime, and the Alaska SeaLife Center's hotline is inundated with calls about orphaned harbor seal pups. The team scrambles to stay ahead of the growing list of rescues and rehabs. At the Alaska Raptor Center, a typical day gets flipped upside-down when a call comes in about two bald eagles on the ground. At the Alaska Wildlife Conservation Center, it's time to move the wood bison to their spring pasture, but Bull 299 won't make it easy.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol S5E3
programme.desc: The staff of Pol Vet Services has one head-scratcher after another, from the peculiar to the downright bizarre. With over 19,000 clients, it's only a matter of time before the vets are presented with a unique case that they've never seen before. Dr. Pol leads the charge into uncharted territory. He devises a way to noninvasively remove penile carcinomas threatening a beloved horse, and advises a client on how to best treat her duck whose penis has prolapsed. Dr. Brenda also has her hands full with a herniated pig, and a beagle that has a brain-shaped vaginal polyp. Not to be outdone, Dr. Emily, the newest vet at PVS, completes her 'first flip and stitch' LDA treatment on a dairy cow, treats a tongue-twisted horse, and delivers a deformed calf with no anus. All in a days work at Pol Vet Services!

programme.title: Pond Stars E3
programme.desc: The Pond Stars head to the world-renowned Lincoln Park Zoo in downtown Chicago for two massive projects. First they come up with a solution to the Red Wolf exhibit whose pond has never functioned properly. While that's going on they also have a small rehab job to do on a water feature at the bird exhibit. What makes matters even harder is the Pond Stars have only 4 days to get it all done.

programme.title: India's Wild Leopards
programme.desc: India may be the land of the Tiger, but it is also home to masters of stealth that prowl the deepest of jungles and the highest of mountains. Journey to Ladakh in the Himalaya in search of Snow Leopards - the ghost of the mountains. Then venture into the realm of the smallest of big cats - the Clouded Leopard in the jungles of north east India. Wildlife Cameraman & National Geographic Fellow, Sandesh Kadur is on a mission to uncover their secretive lives.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom S1E2
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run, desperately looking for a safe place to raise their six puppies but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators that prey on their young. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao can save them.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn Compilations E2
programme.desc: Around the world, when the sun goes down, deadly dangers emerge. In the Arabian Desert, a gecko realizes he's not alone when the sand beneath his feet starts shifting. In Southern India, a praying mantis prays as an army of weaver ants march toward his arms and legs. In the African wilderness, a lion cub cries for his mother while a hyena gets closer, and closer. Who will survive the horrors of tonight, and who will be dead by dawn?

programme.title: Legendary Catch E1
programme.desc: In this chapter of Carter Andrews' life long quest to find and catch the most legendary fish to swim on the planet, he is in hot pursuit of the giant White Sturgeon -- the apex predator in the rivers of the Pacific Northwest. Armed with years of angling knowledge, Carter teams up with different local experts along the way to find the mammoth fish he's after. Will Carter find the legendary fish that history proves have patrolled these rivers for years? Or will he be outwitted by this pre-historic species?

programme.title: Savage Kingdom S1E2
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run, desperately looking for a safe place to raise their six puppies but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators that prey on their young. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao can save them.

programme.title: India's Wild Leopards
programme.desc: India may be the land of the Tiger, but it is also home to masters of stealth that prowl the deepest of jungles and the highest of mountains. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators that prey on their young. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao can save them.

programme.title: Wild Cats Of India E1
programme.desc: India's big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir. Using the latest camera technology, the lives of these Big Cats have been brought to our very homes in Episode 1!

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends S4E6
programme.desc: Dogs are the main characters featured in this episode. You'll see a cheetah who's friends with a Rhodesian Ridgeback, and a couple of Dalmatians who're cuddle partners with a cat, and another unlikely friendship between a human and an animal: a Floridian veterinarian who's friends with a pig.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn Compilations E2
programme.desc: Around the world, when the sun goes down, deadly dangers emerge. In the Arabian Desert, a gecko realizes he's not alone when the sand beneath his feet starts shifting. In Southern India, a praying mantis prays as an army of weaver ants march toward his arms and legs. In the African wilderness, a lion cub cries for his mother while a hyena gets closer, and closer. Who will survive the horrors of tonight, and who will be dead by dawn?

programme.title: Alaska Animal Rescue E2
programme.desc: It's springtime, and the Alaska SeaLife Center's hotline is inundated with calls about orphaned harbor seal pups. The team scrambles to stay ahead of the growing list of rescues and rehabs. At the Alaska Raptor Center, a typical day gets flipped upside-down when a call comes in about two bald eagles on the ground. At the Alaska Wildlife Conservation Center, it's time to move the wood bison to their spring pasture, but Bull 299 won't make it easy.

programme.title: Fishing For Giants E2
programme.desc: Legendary South African angler, Andy Coetzee, has travelled the world in search of the largest and most elusive fish on the planet, but a few big fish still elude him - the Dogtooth Tuna is on his red list. Catching a Dogtooth Tuna is the holy grail - even a small one fights like a heavyweight. Andy's epic quest plunges him into the depths of 'the Kennels'. A massive canyon with fierce current, in uncharted waters. It's Dogtooth central and Andy can't wait to wet his line... but nothing in fishing is predictable or guaranteed.

programme.title: Legendary Catch E1
programme.desc: In this chapter of Carter Andrews' life long quest to find and catch the most legendary fish to swim on the planet, he is in hot pursuit of the giant White Sturgeon -- the apex predator in the rivers of the Pacific Northwest. Armed with years of angling knowledge, Carter teams up with different local experts along the way to find the mammoth fish he's after. Will Carter find the legendary fish that history proves have patrolled these rivers for years? Or will he be outwitted by this pre-historic species?

programme.title: Snakes In The City S4E2
programme.desc: Simon and Siouxsie get called to remove an angry black mamba from a huge wood pile. After 5 hours of searching they eventually find it, and it is seriously angry. A vicious spitting cobra spits venom like mad when Simon tries to get it out of a tree cavity, and it takes them almost a month to trap an elusive forest cobra that's been terrorizing trailer park residents!

programme.title: Freaks & Creeps E1
programme.desc: Lucy heads off to the rainforests of Borneo where countless strange creatures live. Her goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey. Along the way, she finds many other 'odd ones' that have come up with strange adaptations to survive in Borneo, like frogs that fly, a tarsier with eyes that are bigger than its brain and the wooly bat that makes its home in a carnivorous plant.

programme.title: India's Wild Leopards
programme.desc: India may be the land of the Tiger, but it is also home to masters of stealth that prowl the deepest of jungles and the highest of mountains. Journey to Ladakh in the Himalaya in search of Snow Leopards - the ghost of the mountains. Then venture into the realm of the smallest of big cats - the Clouded Leopard in the jungles of north east India. Wildlife Cameraman & National Geographic Fellow, Sandesh Kadur is on a mission to uncover their secretive lives.

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends S5E2 ?
programme.desc: This episode features a dairy goat nursing and protecting a motherless foal. They share hay and drink together every day like a family. A parrot and a boxer cuddle and stay side-by-side without apprehension. These unlikely pals will definitely leave you in sheer amazement.

programme.title: Lion Kingdom E2
programme.desc: The Glade is a paradise where there is always water, a place where strange things happen. As the dry continues in Ruaha, herds of elephants arrive in the Glade. They dig deep into the sand with their trunks to tap the cleanest waters. The Glade pride copy the elephants - unusual behavior, but not in the Glade. Life carries on in its idiosyncratic way, but soon things may change. Adult male lions are on the horizon, they're following the buffalo. The Njaa pride have already spotted the males. The Njaa are drifters, they consider the buffalo their territory. But even these fearless lionesses will not hunt while the lions are about - and now the males are on their way to the Glade.

programme.title: Alaska Animal Rescue E2
programme.desc: It's springtime, and the Alaska SeaLife Center's hotline is inundated with calls about orphaned harbor seal pups. The team scrambles to stay ahead of the growing list of rescues and rehabs. At the Alaska Raptor Center, a typical day gets flipped upside-down when a call comes in about two bald eagles on the ground. At the Alaska Wildlife Conservation Center, it's time to move the wood bison to their spring pasture, but Bull 299 won't make it easy.

programme.title: Search For King Cobra E1
programme.desc: Its 14 feet long with almost 2 teaspoons of available venom. This is the King Cobra. Translated its scientific name means 'snake eater'. A King kills and consumes other snakes up to 10 feet long. All forest residents live in fear of him including human beings. But his empire is under threat? Hes a resident of India the most populated part of the planet, and hes having to mix more and more with villagers. Its March in Indias Western Ghats, and that means one thing for King cobras - finding a mate. Having been dormant for the last few months, they are now fully alert and hot on the trail of female pheromones. The trail leads them right through a crowded village. Enter Gowri Shankar a snake expert who responds to calls from panicked villagers. Instead of beating the snakes to death, Gowri carefully captures them and takes them to a place of safety. Little is known about these highly venomous snakes. Previous research and tagging projects have only started to scratch the surface.

programme.title: Alaska Animal Rescue E3
programme.desc: There's a baby boom in Alaska! The rescue team from the Alaska SeaLife Center hits the road when a newborn sea otter gets separated from its mom. If this baby is alright, she'll require round-the-clock care. A new baby also arrives at the Alaska Raptor Center when a bald eaglet falls from its nest. But there's no time to rest. The team must also jump into action to save a stranded, injured eagle that's lost a fight. And at the Alaska Wildlife Conservation Center, two foxes rescued as kits are getting a habitat upgrade. But first they have to learn all the necessary tricks to make the big move.

programme.title: Fishing For Giants E3
programme.desc: Extreme angler Andy Coetzee, has travelled the world in search of the largest, wiliest and most elusive fish on the planet, but a few big fish still elude him - the Guinean Giant Barracuda is one of them. Andy's epic quest plunges him into deepest, darkest Africa to find the scariest and most dangerous fish of them all. A fish that's worthy of horror movies. Catching one is exhillarating... but landing it can be life-threatening. A whirlwind of teeth and hooks in a confined space, they don't go down without a brutal struggle.

At the Alaska Wildlife Conservation Center, it's time to move the wood bison to their spring pasture, but Bull 299 won't make it easy.

programme.title: Pond Stars E4
programme.desc: Greg and the team head to the sunshine state for two massive pond projects outside of Jacksonville, Florida. This first is to build one of the team's most challenging designs by completing a 30-foot pond and a 2,000-pound cypress bench. The Pond Stars then have to race the clock to design and install a new pond, patio and pergola in less than 48 hours.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club S3E3
programme.desc: See some of the world's biggest animals duke it out in extreme environments across the globe. A herd of male elephants go tusk-to-tusk and trunk-to-trunk as they battle it out in the heat of the African savannah, while in frozen Alaska, two huge polar bears engage in territorial combat, leaving blood-stained snow in their wake.

programme.title: Dragon Island
programme.desc: We'll whisk you to an island where dragons still roam. Deep in the remote basin of the Pacific Ocean, Komodo Island is home to the largest living lizard on the planet. A mythical beast with scales, a long tail and hooked claws, the Komodo dragon fights every day for supremacy and territory. But this deadly predator is also clinging to survival; only around 5,000 of these dragons still exist.

programme.title: Freaks & Creeps E1
programme.desc: Lucy heads off to the rainforests of Borneo where countless strange creatures live. Her goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey. Along the way, she finds many other 'odd ones' that have come up with strange adaptations to survive in Borneo, like frogs that fly, a tarsier with eyes that are bigger than its brain and the wooly bat that makes its home in a carnivorous plant.

programme.title: Pond Stars E4
programme.desc: Greg and the team head to the sunshine state for two massive pond projects outside of Jacksonville, Florida. This first is to build one of the team's most challenging designs by completing a 30-foot pond and a 2,000-pound cypress bench. The Pond Stars then have to race the clock to design and install a new pond, patio and pergola in less than 48 hours.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol S5E2
programme.desc: The Isabella County Fair is just around the corner - which means Dr. Pol, Dr. Emily and Dr. Brenda are busy treating fair animals, making sure they are in tiptop shape for competition. Dr. Pol and Charles start the day tending to a fair pig, whose future isn't looking so fair after all. Will Dr. Pol be able to get this prolapsed show pig back in shape? Across town, Dr. Emily's up to bat, with a cow named Toro - who's abdominal hernia seems to be more than a hiccup on the road to winning the blue ribbon. Now it's Dr. Brenda's turn - there are two horn-y things on the heads of steers, Big Ron and Hannah, preventing them from getting fair-side. When the gates open and the animals come rolling in - Doc Pol's the man the Isabella County Fair looks to, to make sure all of the 4H animals are healthy and ready to show. But just because Dr. Pol works at the fair, doesn't mean he can't have a little fun at the fair too!

programme.title: Dragon Island
programme.desc: We'll whisk you to an island where dragons still roam. Deep in the remote basin of the Pacific Ocean, Komodo Island is home to the largest living lizard on the planet. A mythical beast with scales, a long tail and hooked claws, the Komodo dragon fights every day for supremacy and territory. But this deadly predator is also clinging to survival; only around 5,000 of these dragons still exist.

programme.title: Shark Men S3E7
programme.desc: Under the cloak of darkness, shark fin poachers boldly enter Cocos Islands' protected waters and this is the first time the Shark Men have on-board security in case of a confrontation. Under tense conditions, the team prioritizes the tagging task for hammerhead sharks as their bigger fins are desired for slaughter.

programme.title: When Predators Attack (Mashups) E1
programme.desc: In the wild and in our homes, snakes are formidable reptiles, using deadly venom or the power of constriction to overcome their prey?and people. With shrinking natural habitats, close encounters with snake are becoming more common. Unlock the secrets behind great escapes and learn more about these serpents' killer packages.

programme.title: Hunter Vs. Hunted E3
programme.desc: This is a three-episode comp series that uses forensics-style investigations to explore wild animal attacks on people and why they happen.

programme.title: World's Weirdest S3E3
programme.desc: Witness freak encounters, unexpected assaults and killer animal instincts - these are the World's Weirdest Sneak Attacks. This episode showcases the most shocking and unusual animal encounters, including a cyclist who crashes into an antelope, a man who finds a fish in his urethra and a relocation of an alligator found in a highway ditch becomes disastrous.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol S5E3
programme.desc: The staff of Pol Vet Services has one head-scratcher after another, from the peculiar to the downright bizarre. With over 19,000 clients, it's only a matter of time before the vets are presented with a unique case that they've never seen before. Dr. Pol leads the charge into uncharted territory. He devises a way to noninvasively remove penile carcinomas threatening a beloved horse, and advises a client on how to best treat her duck whose penis has prolapsed. Dr. Brenda also has her hands full with a herniated pig, and a beagle that has a brain-shaped vaginal polyp. Not to be outdone, Dr. Emily, the newest vet at PVS, completes her 'first flip and stitch' LDA treatment on a dairy cow, treats a tongue-twisted horse, and delivers a deformed calf with no anus. All in a days work at Pol Vet Services!

programme.title: Savage Kingdom S3E6
programme.desc: After the death of her mother, Motshidi is starving and alone. In a terrifying reunion with her father, she has everything to lose. But in an uncharacteristic act of charity, Blue Eyes takes pity, giving Motshodi a new lease of life. A violent traitor rises in the rotten ranks, challenging the selfish princess and bringing an end to Mmamotse's rule. The Makulu Pack make one last stand as the battle for supremacy begins, but with the hyenas gone, it's up to Sega to lead the Matahta Pride to victory.

programme.title: Blue Bloods S10E1
programme.desc: Danny and Baez grapple with a year-old homicide investigation brought to their attention by Maggie (Callie Thorne), the medium who previously helped them solve a case. Also, Frank looks for a way to help his ex-partner Lenny Ross (Treat Williams) when his daughter is arrested; Jamie and Eddie go apartment hunting; and Erin faces off against a cold-blooded defense attorney from her past, on the 10th season premiere.

programme.title: Songland S1E9
programme.desc: Undiscovered songwriters pitch original material to Leona Lewis, who's looking for her next hit, and a panel of top music producers, who work to creatively adapt the songs to the star; Leona Lewis chooses one song to record and release.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E9
programme.desc: While Mac's friends surround him during his time of grief, Los Angeles' power grid is taken hostage in a ransomware attack resulting in a citywide blackout, and the team discovers the code used was written by Riley years ago.

programme.title: Seal Team S3E15
programme.desc: While Bravo Team is on a special reconnaissance mission abroad, they are diverted to protect a group of American engineers and the dam they are constructing from a terrorist attack. The rules of engagement raise the level of danger, as the team is not permitted to use their weapons unless the enemy fires first.

programme.title: Madam Secretary S6E7
programme.desc: When U.S. intelligence locates the mastermind behind a foreign country's hack, Elizabeth must decide whether to risk war by extracting him from the country while she also prepares for the White House correspondents' dinner. Also, Jason faces backlash after he confronts his school newspaper over its coverage of Elizabeth.

programme.title: Bulletproof S2E1
programme.desc: The show follows two undercover cops, Bishop and Pike as they chase hardened criminals in London's East End.

programme.title: Supernatural S15E12
programme.desc: Sam and Dean respond to a frantic call and - together with Castiel, Jack and Sheriff Jody Mills (recurring guest star KIM RHODES) - assist in an extraordinary and heartbreaking rescue. Then, Billie (guest star LISA BERRY) surprises everyone with a visit to the bunker.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0 S10E6
programme.sub-title: A‘Ohe Pau Ka ‘Ike I Ka Halau Ho‘Okahi (All Knowledge Is Not Learned In Just
programme.desc: McGarrett and the team investigate when a deadly hit-and-run involves a driverless car carrying heroin, and what could be a new means for delivering drugs.

programme.title: Seal Team S3E15
programme.desc: While Bravo Team is on a special reconnaissance mission abroad, they are diverted to protect a group of American engineers and the dam they are constructing from a terrorist attack. programme.title: The Blacklist S7E14
programme.desc: A Blacklist case becomes personal for Agent Park (Laura Sohn) when the team investigates a mysterious disappearance in the Alaska Triangle. Meanwhile, Aram (Amir Arison) enlists Red's (James Spader) help to find out what really happened to Elodie's (guest star Elizabeth Bogush) husband.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E9
programme.desc: While Mac's friends surround him during his time of grief, Los Angeles' power grid is taken hostage in a ransomware attack resulting in a citywide blackout, and the team discovers the code used was written by Riley years ago.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A film crew finds trouble in the Amazon when it takes on a passenger obsessed with killing the world's largest reptile. Stars Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E10
programme.desc: MACGYVER, a reimagining of the classic series, is an action-adventure drama about 20-something Angus “Mac” MacGyver, who creates a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, where he uses his extraordinary talent for unconventional problem-solving and his vast scientific knowledge to save lives.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0 S10E7
programme.desc: When the CIA informs McGarrett that his mother has gone rogue on her undercover mission and may have killed her partner, Steve goes solo to Mexico to bring her home and prove her innocence.

programme.title: The Blacklist S7E15
programme.desc: The Blacklist season seven will pick up from the cliffhanger of season six when Red (James Spader) was stabbed by Katarina (Lotte Verbeek) with a syringe and his unconcious body was piled into a van.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E10
programme.desc: When Mac is put into a dream state to help him recall key evidence found in Nikola Tesla's secret lab that could stop Codex's deadly plot, he encounters Nikola Tesla, Alexander Graham Bell, Thomas Edison...and his mother.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: A convict (Brenden Fraser) breaks out of prison to protect his son and daughter from a pair of ruthless killers (Dominic Purcell and Ethan Suplee) who are hunting them through the forest.

programme.title: Paranormal Witness: True Terror S5E2
programme.desc: When 3 young college students move into a rental property in a rundown neighborhood of Savannah, but they never expected to come face to face with the spirit of a demented crack fiend.

programme.title: R U There

programme.title: Act Of Dishonor
programme.desc: Mena is a beautiful young woman in a remote village in Afghanistan. Modest and respectful of local customs, she and her fiancé have little contact with each other. But her friendship with a Canadian film crew member soon exposes her to a whole new world.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: Streets Of Berlin: Corrosive
programme.desc: In one of Berlin’s illegal immigrant clusters, human remains are found in an acid-filled drum. Investigations soon illuminate a tragic family story, one that serves as ghastly reflection of the desperate and depraved world of illegal immigrants.

programme.title: Dreamfools
programme.desc: Sergio and Sabrina, penniless lovers, are unable to leave each other. When Sergio is pranked to be the winner of a billionaire lottery, he walks out on his wife bringing with him Sabrina, and their loved ones on a crazy trip to South of Italy.

programme.title: In-Laws In The Outback
programme.desc: The Kowlaskis and the Von Zagenheim’s marriages are on the verge of a breakdown when their children decide to get married. They travel to the South African bush for the wedding but lose their way en-route and stumble into an illegal diamond mine.

programme.title: None Like Us
programme.desc: Based in Turin, Italy in the 80s, this movie explores the binaries of faith and mistrust, lies and truth as its characters discover love. One falls for a best friend while the other finds out that a mentor has been hiding an affair with a friend’s father.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Merciless
programme.desc: Judge Dr Kleinhart is famous for his harsh sentences. When hate mails escalate into deadly threats, investigator Helen Dorn is roped in. Things become amiss when Kleinhart refuses police protection even when his house is set ablaze and danger surges.

programme.title: Picket Fences
programme.desc: Kenan, a reclusive Turkish widower, lives beside Lissi, a happy-go-lucky landlady. Both rarely see eye to eye with one another. But when Kenan’s kids embark on a mission to get their father a new woman, things take an unexpected comedic turn.

programme.title: Snow (Snaig)
programme.desc: Brothers Lyubaka and Gosho rob a post office with their sons. When Lyubaka runs away with the loot and is later found dead, the trio race to recover the money while his son Bobby tries to find how he died. But this leads him to terrifying family secrets.

programme.title: The Cell

programme.title: Blood & Chrome
programme.desc: An all-new chapter in the Battlestar Galactica takes place in the midst of the first Cylon war.

programme.title: Occupation
programme.desc: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion. As they struggle to survive, they realize they must stay one step ahead of their attackers, and work together for a chance to strike back.

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: Dragonball Evolution is the long-awaited, live-action motion picture based on the popular Japanese manga created by Akira Toriyama. ^^Justin Chatwin stars as the heroic Goku, a powerful warrior who protects the Earth from an endless stream of rogues bent on dominating the Universe and controlling mystical objects - Dragonballs. Throughout his quest he gets help from Bulma (Rossum), a beautiful woman intent on retrieving the mystical Dragonballs for her own reasons; Chi Chi (Jamie Chung), a young martial artist who captures Goku's eye; and Roshi (Chow), the Master who guides Goku on the young man's epic quest to save the Earth from the forces of darkness.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Riddick
programme.desc: 5 years after Pitch Black, the wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

programme.title: Redcon-1
programme.desc: After a deadly viral outbreak, an elite squad of special forces soldiers must infiltrate a quarantine zone to rescue a scientist who holds the only cure to save mankind.

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

programme.title: The Predator (2018)
programme.desc: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Recently retired boxer Rocky falls on hard times after his accountant mismanages his finances. He stages a comeback fight against young boxer Tommy, while also trying to mend his shaky relationship with his son, Robert.

programme.title: He's Out There
programme.desc: On vacation at a remote lake house, a mother and her two young daughters must fight for survival after falling into a terrifying and bizarre nightmare conceived by a psychopath.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

programme.title: The Lodgers
programme.desc: A family curse confines orphaned twins Rachel and Edward to their home as punishment for their ancestors' sins. The twins must follow three rules and breaking any of these rules will incur the wrath of a sinister presence that inhabits the house after midnight.

programme.desc: One of the city's last decent tow truck drivers risks everything on a desperate quest to become king of the road and provide for his struggling family.

programme.title: The Haunted House On Kirby Road
programme.desc: A group of 20-somethings set out to discover if an urban myth of a haunted house holds any truth.

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: Set in the 22nd century, a battered salvage ship sends out a distress signal and the seasoned crew of the rescue hospital ship Nova-17 responds. What they find is a black hole that threatens to destroy both ships and a mysterious survivor whose body mutates into a monstrous and deadly form.

programme.title: Candy Corn
programme.desc: It's Halloween weekend and a group of bullies are planning their annual hazing on local outcast, Jacob Atkins. When they take things too far, he's resurrected to seek revenge against those that wronged him.

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Recently retired boxer Rocky falls on hard times after his accountant mismanages his finances. He stages a comeback fight against young boxer Tommy, while also trying to mend his shaky relationship with his son, Robert.

programme.title: Daughter Of The Wolf
programme.desc: Ex-military specialist Clair Hamilton returns home from her tour in the Middle East due to her father's passing and to claim her inheritance. Her son is then kidnapped and held for ransom by a gang led by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: A retired hitman wants to lead a normal life with his new girlfriend and her daughter but is unwillingly brought back into the game.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.

programme.title: Judge Dredd
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.

programme.title: Taxi (2004)
programme.desc: Sassy hip-hop star Queen Latifah brings hilarious attitude to this hard-driving, high-octane comedy! Latifah plays Belle, New York's fastest cabbie, whose taxi-driving expertise – not to mention her loaded-to-the-max vehicle – comes in handy when a fumbling young undercover cop (Jimmy Fallon) must crack a bank robbery plot hatched by a gang of supermodels! Don't miss this tire-squealing, stop-on-a-dime comedy with a topflight cast of stars, including NYPD Blue's Henry Simmons, Ann-Margaret and supermodel Gisele Bundchen!

programme.title: Isle Of The Dead
programme.desc: A military squad is sent to a deserted island in the Pacific Ocean in order to secure top secret records involving a zombie epidemic that wiped out the large scientific team experimenting with various test chemicals and toxins which leads to the team battling not only zombies, but the lone surviving scientist who has plans for the future of the human race.

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: Fifty years from now, the sun is dying, and mankind is dying with it. A team of astronauts are sent with a device to revive the sun but deep into their voyage, out of radio contact with Earth, their mission is starts to unravel. There is an accident, a fatal mistake, and a distress beacon from a spaceship that disappeared seven years earlier.

programme.title: Redcon-1
programme.desc: After a deadly viral outbreak, an elite squad of special forces soldiers must infiltrate a quarantine zone to rescue a scientist who holds the only cure to save mankind.

But despite the bounty on his head and pressure to leave the country, he teams up with an ex-military mercenary out to settle a score of his own to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: To rescue his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and battle an old enemy... and rediscover the child in himself.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: When a meteor bearing single-celled organisms crashes to the Earth, the creatures begin to evolve at an exponentially rapid rate, resulting in fearsome aliens running amok and possibly spelling mankind's doom.

programme.title: Little Women (1994)
programme.desc: Based on Louisa May Alcotts classic novel, the film adaptation relates the dramas and adventures of Mrs. March's four 'little women' - spirited Jo, beautiful Meg, fragile Beth and romantic Amy - and serves as a glowing depiction of 19th century family life and a tribute to family strength and feminine independence.

programme.title: The Angel In The Clock
programme.desc: Amelia, a girl who is ill, wishes to stop time. She will learn the value of 'here' and 'now' in order to go forward every day and fight for what we want the most.

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: From the creators of Ice Age comes EPIC, the fast-paced, hilarious adventure for the whole family! Transported to a magical world, a teenager is recruited by a nature spirit, Queen Tara, to help the Leafmen save their existence and ours from evil warriors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Sharkboy And Lavagirl
programme.desc: Everyone always knew that Max had a wild imagination, but no one believed that his wildest creations, a boy raised by watchful great white sharks and a girl with the force of a volcano were real. Now, these two pint-sized action masters will show Max that even an ordinary kid has what it takes to be extraordinary.

programme.title: Cheaper By The Dozen
programme.desc: Tom Baker (Martin) and wife Kate (Hunt) have a dozen children where the family's day-to-day life is marked by equal parts love and chaos. When Tom is offered his dream job, he and Kate uproot the family, much to the displeasure of all 12 children. At the same time, Kate learns that her memoirs are about to be published. Her agent whisks her away to New York to promote the book, leaving Tom home alone to handle the increasingly unhappy and hectic household, as well as his demanding new job. With all hell breaking loose at home, Kate on the road, and Tom's job on the line, the Baker family ultimately chooses not to have it all, but to love what they already have.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all. She's the president of her sorority, Miss June in her campus calendar, and dates the most popular boy in school. So, when he packs up for Harvard Law and reunites with his former flame, Ellie rallies all her resources and gets into Harvard, determined to win him back. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of her poolside and the mall. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for her guy, for herself and for all blondes.

programme.title: Madeline
programme.desc: The adventurous (and sometimes bordering mischievous) Madeline (Jones) and her 11 friends live in a school run by Miss Clavel (McDormand) in an old house in Paris. When the owner, Lord Covington (Hawthorne), abruptly decides to sell the house and the future of the school is in jeopardy, Madeline must use all her wits to mastermind a plan to scare off the buyers. Together with Pepito, the devilish son of the Spanish ambassador who lives next door, they must find a way to save the school while at the same time protect each other from harm.

programme.title: Hope Dances
programme.desc: Hope Douglas has a dream but her parents have thrown her into battle between playing sports and dancing ballet. When a tragedy strikes, Hope has to make a difficult choice that will decide her fate - which way does she go?

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: Rudolph is a thirteen year old vampire whose clan is threatened by a notorious vampire hunter. He meets Tony, a mortal of the same age, who is fascinated by old castles, graveyards and - vampires.

programme.title: L.m. Montgomery's Anne Of Green Gables: The Good Stars
programme.desc: When Anne Shirley turns thirteen, she faces complex issues with her friends, inspirational adults and an escalating friendship with Gilbert. Her free-spirited nature is challenged by her perceived need to become sensible.

programme.title: The Stone Boy
programme.desc: Marina and her cousins live in a colorful and tropical valley. One day, the fair arrives to town. They find a boy made out of stone who has been given that condition because of his anger with life. Marina and her cousins will embark on a fantastic journey, traveling around the country of senses, where their citizens would help the stone boy recover his human form.

programme.title: The Angel In The Clock
programme.desc: Amelia, a girl who is ill, wishes to stop time. She will learn the value of 'here' and 'now' in order to go forward every day and fight for what we want the most.

programme.title: The Bbq
programme.desc: Dazza has a passion for barbequing, but when he accidentally gives his neighbours food poisoning, Dazza's reputation is on the line. To make amends he seeks help from a tyrannical Scottish chef and together they'll enter a competition.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: Orphaned, indentured, seemingly with little prospects, Jennifer Strange is thrust reluctantly into the controversial dragonslaying business, where she must do the right thing, even if the power of the king is against her.

programme.title: Cheaper By The Dozen
programme.desc: Tom Baker (Martin) and wife Kate (Hunt) have a dozen children where the family's day-to-day life is marked by equal parts love and chaos. programme.title: Away And Back
programme.desc: Hostility turns into something else between a widowed farmer and a pushy ornithologist who came to his farm to save a family of swans. Could romance be in the air?

programme.title: Problem Child 3
programme.desc: The tiny terror is all grown up. Now in adolescence, Junior's got his eye on the popular girl in his class, but he'll need to do away with his rivals before he can hope to get her attention.

programme.title: Beyond Beyond
programme.desc: Johan is a little rabbit who has lived at sea with his father since he was little. Johan dreams of steering the ship and visiting the Kingdom of the Feather King, as he believes this is where his mother is.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: When a meteor bearing single-celled organisms crashes to the Earth, the creatures begin to evolve at an exponentially rapid rate, resulting in fearsome aliens running amok and possibly spelling mankind's doom.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Adapted from the smash Broadway musical, Annie (Quinn) is a spunky little girl who lives in an orphanage run by the boozy, tyrannical Miss Hannigan (Burnett). Annie's hopes of finding her dream family soars when multigazillionaire Oliver Warbucks (Finney) decides to take in an orphan for a week to 'upgrade his image”. However, as her dreams become closer to reality, Miss Hannigan is around the corner conspiring to ruin it all and it is up to Annie's friends to rescue her before it's too late.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

programme.title: Beyond Beyond
programme.desc: Johan is a little rabbit who has lived at sea with his father since he was little. Johan dreams of steering the ship and visiting the Kingdom of the Feather King, as he believes this is where his mother is.

programme.desc: When Anne Shirley turns thirteen, she faces complex issues with her friends, inspirational adults and an escalating friendship with Gilbert. Her free-spirited nature is challenged by her perceived need to become sensible.

programme.title: You Can Tutu
programme.desc: Sometimes it's hard to be yourself, but 12-year-old Tutu Marlow hasn't ever really had that problem. That is until her first day at Best Pointe Ballet School.

programme.title: School Of Rock
programme.desc: Kicked out of his band and desperate for work, a guitarist impersonates a substitute teacher and turns a class of fifth grade high-achievers into high-voltage rock and rollers.

programme.title: The Bromley Boys
programme.desc: Welcome to the worst football team in Britain. With 14 year-old Dave's beloved local team Bromley FC on the brink of bankruptcy, a chance discovery sees Dave's world turn upside down - as he becomes their manager.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A bright young girl creates her own place in the world through strength, courage, and an exceptional knack for mischief when she is surrounded by wicked grownups.

programme.title: Problem Child 3
programme.desc: The tiny terror is all grown up. Now in adolescence, Junior's got his eye on the popular girl in his class, but he'll need to do away with his rivals before he can hope to get her attention.

programme.title: Men In Black II
programme.desc: Kay and Jay reunite to provide our best line of defense against a seductress who levels the toughest challenge yet to the MIBs mission statement: protecting the earth from the scum of the universe. While investigating a routine crime, Jay uncovers a plot masterminded by Serleena, a Kylothian monster who disguises herself as a lingerie model. When Serleena takes the MIB building hostage, there is only one person Jay can turn to -- his former MIB partner.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: The law has its limits, but ex-military investigator Jack Reacher does not when his fight for the truth pits him against an unexpected enemy with a skill for violence and a secret to keep.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: A deadly threat from Earth's history reappears, and a hunt for a lost artifact takes place between Autobots and Decepticons, while Optimus Prime encounters his creator in space.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also A Star
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic ambivalent about his future in medical school falls for a hard-luck young woman who doesn't believe in love.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business, inviting an evil presence into their home.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Gordon Jennings and his friends enjoy a luxurious lifestyle funded by bank robberies. A daring plan to rob an armored car puts them on a collision course with Russian mobsters and a detective who will do anything to capture them.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: It's great to be Spider-Man. For Peter Parker, there's no feeling quite like swinging between skyscrapers, embracing being the hero, and spending time with Gwen. But being Spider-Man comes at a price: only Spider-Man can protect his fellow New Yorkers from the formidable villains that threaten the city. With the emergence of Electro, Peter must confront a foe far more powerful than himself. And as his old friend, Harry Osborn, returns, Peter comes to realize that all of his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp.

programme.title: Higher Power
programme.desc: When the Universe decides what it wants, it's pointless to resist. With his family's life at stake, Joseph Steadman finds himself the unwilling test subject of a maniacal scientist in a battle that could save the world, or destroy it.

programme.title: Wall-E
programme.desc: After hundreds of lonely years of doing what he was built for, WALL•E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE. EVE comes to realize that WALL•E has inadvertently stumbled upon the key to the planet's future, and races back to space to report her findings to the humans (who have been eagerly awaiting word that it is safe to return home).

programme.title: Vault
programme.desc: Vault tells a story about a group of small time criminals in 1975 who attempt to pull off the biggest heist in American history: stealing over $30 million from the Mafia in the smallest state in the union, Rhode Island.

programme.title: Shrek The Third
programme.desc: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also A Star
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic ambivalent about his future in medical school falls for a hard-luck young woman who doesn't believe in love.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Jenko (Channing Tatum) when they go deep undercover at a local college. But when Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team, and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art major scene, they begin to question their partnership. Now they don't have to just crack the case - they have to figure out if they can have a mature relationship.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

programme.title: X-Men: Days Of Future Past
programme.desc: The ultimate X-Men ensemble fights a war for the survival of the species across two time periods in X-MEN: DAYS OF FUTURE PAST. The beloved characters from the original 'X-Men' film trilogy join forces with their younger selves from the past, 'X-Men: First Class,' in order to change a major historical event and fight in an epic battle that could save our future.

programme.title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
programme.desc: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

programme.title: Baywatch (2017)

And as his old friend, Harry Osborn, returns, Peter comes to realize that all of his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp.

The Whispering
programme.desc: Sepasang kekasih yang sedang dalam perjalanan untuk merayakan kelulusan bersama murid-murid lainnya pergi ke sebuah taman hiburan yang terbengkalai. Di sana, mereka menemukan sebuah 'Rumah Hantu'.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Seorang penagih utang menderita kanker hati dan harus mendapatkan transplantasi hati dalam sepuluh hari. Seorang penipu bersedia mendonorkan hatinya jika ia bisa melacak pria yang memasukkannya ke dalam penjara.

programme.title: Along With Gods: Two Worlds
programme.desc: Usai meninggal, pemadam kebakaran Ja-hong dibawa ke alam baka oleh tiga penjaga. Demi bereinkarnasi, ia harus melewati tujuh ujian dalam 49 hari guna membuktikan bahwa ia menjalani kehidupan yang lurus semasa hidup.

programme.title: Along With Gods: Last 49 Days
programme.desc: Tiga malaikat kematian akan memandu jiwa ke-49 mereka, Kim Soo-Hong, ke pengadilan akhirat. Sementara itu, Dewa Penjaga Rumah akan memulihkan ingatan mereka dari 1.000 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, seorang wanita Korea berusia 30-an, tiba-tiba menunjukkan tanda-tanda dirasuki oleh sosok almarhum ibu dan kakak perempuannya setelah ia menjadi ibu rumah tangga.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: Seorang dokter menyaksikan kecelakaan mobil yang melibatkan putrinya, dan pada hari yang sama secara berulang-ulang. Ia pun berjuang untuk keluar dari putaran waktu dan menyelamatkan putrinya.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo bergabung dengan tim elit yang dibentuk oleh seorang gangster yang menyamar menjadi seorang investor untuk melakukan penipuan terbesar demi mendapatkan 60.000.000 dolar dari pasar saham.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: Seorang mantan pembunuh berantai dengan penyakit Alzheimer membunuh orang-orang yang telah melakukan dosa 'buruk'. Kini, ia berjuang melindungi putrinya dari pacarnya yang kasar.

programme.title: The Spy: Undercover Operation
programme.desc: Seorang agen yang sedang menyamar di luar negeri berusaha untuk menyeimbangkan pekerjaannya yang rumit dan istrinya yang tak tahu pekerjaannya.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Dua mahasiswa dari Universitas Kepolisian Nasional Korea memutuskan untuk bekerjasama dan menyelidiki sebuah insiden penculikan.

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: Seorang pengacara nan kaku bekerjasama dengan seorang detektif pembunuhan yang temperamental dan kejam untuk menangkap seorang bos mafia yang bertanggung jawab atas kematian adik laki-laki seorang jaksa.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Dua orang yang baru saja dicampakkan menghabiskan malam dengan mabuk bersama untuk melupakan mantan mereka, lalu sepakat untuk bertemu sembilan kali lagi sebelum berjanji untuk tidak bertemu lagi.

programme.title: Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Setelah nyaris tewas dari serangan seorang pembunuh berantai nan kejam, seorang bos kriminal bekerjasama dengan seorang detektif setempat untuk menangkap sang pembunuh.

programme.title: Wonderful Nightmare
programme.desc: Akibat kesalahan di surga, seorang pengacara nan tak percaya cinta tewas dalam kecelakaan mobil. Guna menutupi kesalahan mereka, ia harus hidup sebagai ibu rumah tangga selama sebulan demi kembali ke kehidupan lamanya.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: Seorang detektif veteran dan sesosok peramal menjalin kerja sama yang tidak biasa untuk menyelamatkan seorang anak yang diculik sebelum terlambat.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, seorang mata-mata Korea Utara yang telah tinggal di Korea Selatan selama 22 tahun tiba-tiba dihubungi oleh atasannya. Mereka berencana untuk menyelesaikan misi sebelumnya dan mencuri uang simpanan target sebanyak-banyaknya.

programme.title: Thread Of Lies
programme.desc: Terpukul akibat bunuh diri sang putri yang berusia 14 tahun, seorang ibu dan putri tertuanya bertekad untuk memecahkan misteri kematian putrinya itu dengan menyelami kehidupan gadis yang merundung sang putri.

programme.title: Open City
programme.desc: Seorang polisi menyelamatkan seorang gadis muda dari bahaya, namun ia terkejut saat mengetahui bahwa gadis tersebut adalah ketua geng yang memiliki hubungan dengan kelompok Yakuza Jepang yang selama ini ia incar.

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: Seorang pengacara nan kaku bekerjasama dengan seorang detektif pembunuhan yang temperamental dan kejam untuk menangkap seorang bos mafia yang bertanggung jawab atas kematian adik laki-laki seorang jaksa.

programme.title: Secret Love
programme.desc: Situasi menjadi semakin rumit saat seorang istri jatuh cinta pada saudara kembar suaminya yang sedang koma.

programme.title: RV: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Suatu hari, ibu jaksa Jin-hong yang sudah meninggal kembali ke rumah dan mencoba membunuhnya. Ia pun segera menjadi tersangka utama atas pembunuhan ibunya.

programme.title: Typhoon
programme.desc: Seorang pemberontak dari Korea Utara mengungsi ke Korea Selatan, namun ia ditolak oleh pihak berwenang. Ia memutuskan untuk membalas dendam yang bisa mengakibatkan banyak kematian di kedua Korea.

programme.title: The Witch: The Subversion
programme.desc: Ja-yoon melarikan diri dari pemerintah dan diadopsi oleh pasangan senior dan kehilangan semua ingatannya. Kemudian, ketika ia muncul di sebuah program TV, orang-orang asing mulai muncul dalam hidupnya.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: Seorang mantan pembunuh berantai dengan penyakit Alzheimer membunuh orang-orang yang telah melakukan dosa 'buruk'. Kini, ia berjuang melindungi putrinya dari pacarnya yang kasar.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo bergabung dengan tim elit yang dibentuk oleh seorang gangster yang menyamar menjadi seorang investor untuk melakukan penipuan terbesar demi mendapatkan 60.000.000 dolar dari pasar saham.

programme.title: Blood And Ties
programme.desc: Seorang jurnalis mencurigai ayahnya adalah seorang penculik kejam yang melarikan diri 15 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Tiga sekawan yang menghadapi pasang surut kehidupan mencoba untuk tinggal bersama. Namun, persahabatan mereka diuji kala dua diantara mereka tidur bersama.

programme.title: Lump Of Sugar
programme.desc: Seorang gadis sangat sedih saat sahabatnya, seekor kuda, dijual. Namun, saat mereka bertemu lagi dua tahun kemudian, keduanya berkesempatan untuk membuat keajaiban dengan bekerjasama dalam sebuah perlombaan.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Berdasarkan novel karya Bill S. Ballinger dengan judul yang sama, film ini menceritakan tentang seorang pesulap yang merencanakan trik paling rumit untuk mengungkap konspirasi tersembunyi di balik kematian tunangannya.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: Sejumlah orang direkrut untuk menyiarkan langsung pertunjukan horor di Gonjiam, RS paling berhantu di Korea. Untuk menarik lebih banyak penonton, mereka memasang beberapa kejutan seram, tapi keadaan berubah memburuk.

programme.title: Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Setelah nyaris tewas dari serangan seorang pembunuh berantai nan kejam, seorang bos kriminal bekerjasama dengan seorang detektif setempat untuk menangkap sang pembunuh.

programme.title: Truck
programme.desc: Seorang sopir truk tak sengaja melihat pembunuhan oleh sebuah geng. Ia bersedia membantu membuang mayat-mayat itu agar tetap dibiarkan hidup. Namun, situasi memburuk ketika seorang pembunuh berantai menumpang truknya.

programme.title: Along With Gods: Two Worlds
programme.desc: Usai meninggal, pemadam kebakaran Ja-hong dibawa ke alam baka oleh tiga penjaga. Demi bereinkarnasi, ia harus melewati tujuh ujian dalam 49 hari guna membuktikan bahwa ia menjalani kehidupan yang lurus semasa hidup.

programme.title: Along With Gods: Last 49 Days

programme.title: Wok The World
programme.desc: Alvin Leung 'Demon Chef' dan sejumlah muridnya berkeliling ke berbagai negara untuk menjelajahi berbagai hidangan Tiongkok setempat.

programme.title: Wok The World
programme.desc: Alvin Leung 'Demon Chef' dan sejumlah muridnya berkeliling ke berbagai negara untuk menjelajahi berbagai hidangan Tiongkok setempat.

programme.title: M.U.S.T
programme.desc: Irene Kim dan teman-teman selebritasnya melakukan perjalanan romantis di sejumlah kota seperti Seoul, Bangkok dan Singapura, untuk menelusuri kota-kota tersebut dan menikmati budayanya.

programme.title: 3 Meals A Day
programme.desc: TVN menghadirkan kembali serial klasik '3 Meals A Day'! Saksikan kembali musim pertama saat Taecyeon dan Lee Seo Jin akan memasak tiga makanan sehari saat menetap di beberapa desa pertanian di seluruh Korea.

programme.title: Coffee Friends
programme.desc: Na PD bekerjasama dengan Yoo Yeon-seok, dan Sohn Ho-joon untuk melanjutkan proyek amal mereka! Dengan bantuan beberapa tamu selebriti, mereka mengelola sebuah kafe di daerah perkebunan jeruk keprok di Pulau Jeju.

programme.title: Mother's Touch
programme.desc: Seorang aktris veteran sekaligus koki handal di dapur, Kim Su-mi membagikan resepnya kepada tiga koki khusus untuk masakan asing dan mengajari mereka rahasia memasak makanan rumahan Korea.

programme.desc: Na PD bekerjasama dengan Yoo Yeon-seok, dan Sohn Ho-joon untuk melanjutkan proyek amal mereka! Dengan bantuan beberapa tamu selebriti, mereka mengelola sebuah kafe di daerah perkebunan jeruk keprok di Pulau Jeju.

programme.title: May Food Bless You
programme.desc: Bergabunglah dengan komedian Park Na-rae, Song Eun-yi, Kim Sook dan Jang Do-yeon untuk mencari sejumlah restoran unggulan sambil mendengarkan keluhan para pemirsa dan menyembuhkan jiwa mereka.

programme.title: 3 Meals A Day
programme.desc: TVN menghadirkan kembali serial klasik '3 Meals A Day'! Saksikan kembali musim pertama saat Taecyeon dan Lee Seo Jin akan memasak tiga makanan sehari saat menetap di beberapa desa pertanian di seluruh Korea.

programme.title: Wok The World
programme.desc: Alvin Leung 'Demon Chef' dan sejumlah muridnya berkeliling ke berbagai negara untuk menjelajahi berbagai hidangan Tiongkok setempat.

programme.title: Wok The World
programme.desc: Alvin Leung 'Demon Chef' dan sejumlah muridnya berkeliling ke berbagai negara untuk menjelajahi berbagai hidangan Tiongkok setempat.

programme.title: You Can Cook, Sam Kim
programme.desc: Chef terkenal Sam Kim akan mengajarkan cara memasak semua jenis masakan lezat, mulai dari pasta Italia, hidangan Spanyol, hingga hidangan pencuci mulut! Ikuti resepnya dan selamat memasak!

programme.title: The Great Escape S3 Spc.
programme.desc: Escape, variety show No.1 di Korea, kembali untuk musim ke-tiga! Para pemain yang sama kembali menyelesaikan tantangan dengan berbagai petunjuk dalam tema yang berbeda. Namun, kali ini dalam skala yang lebih besar!

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: Seorang aktris musikal yang memiliki kemampuan khusus untuk melihat 'waktu kematian' orang lain, termasuk miliknya, bertemu dengan seorang pria yang dapat menghentikan waktu kematiannya.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: Seorang aktris musikal yang memiliki kemampuan khusus untuk melihat 'waktu kematian' orang lain, termasuk miliknya, bertemu dengan seorang pria yang dapat menghentikan waktu kematiannya.

programme.title: 3 Meals A Day

programme.title: Wok The World
programme.desc: Alvin Leung 'Demon Chef' dan sejumlah muridnya berkeliling ke berbagai negara untuk menjelajahi berbagai hidangan Tiongkok setempat.

programme.title: Undercover Asia
programme.desc: Lebih dari 50.000 pria dan wanita Korea Utara diperlakukan layaknya budak di 40 negara. Sebagian besar gaji mereka diambil paksa dari mereka demi mempertahankan kekuasaan sang Pemimpin Tertinggi.

programme.title: 60 Days In
programme.desc: Saat dua peserta terakhir memasuki Pusat Lembaga Pemasyarakatan Etowah, banyak peserta lain yang berjuang untuk tetap berada dalam acara ini.

programme.title: Born To Kill?
programme.desc: Hobi John Duffy and David Mulcahy, sepasang teman masa kecil, berubah menjadi tindakan kriminal kala mereka beranjak dewasa. Mereka telah memperkosa dan membunuh sejumlah wanita pada tahun 1980-an.

programme.title: Mark Of A Killer
programme.desc: Saat Hillside Stranglers tertangkap, polisi menyadari bahwa masih ada pembunuh berantai berkeliaran di Los Angeles yang menyiksa dan bermain-main dengan korbannya.

programme.title: Surviving R. Kelly
programme.desc: Orangtua para gadis yang berada di kamp R. Kelly menuduhnya mengurung mereka dan melakukan pelecehan seksual. Seorang ibu berhasil mendapatkan kembali putrinya kembali setelah berjuang mati-matian.

programme.title: Surviving R. Kelly
programme.desc: Ketika figur publik besar lainnya bungkam, sejumlah kelompok perempuan maju untuk melawan superstar yang berani melakukan pelecehan seksual ini. Apakah R. Kelly akan terbukti bersalah?

programme.title: Elizabeth Shoaf: In A Bunker
programme.desc: Lebih dari satu dekade sejak Elizabeth Shoaf keluar dari ruang bawah tanah di hutan Carolina Selatan. Kini, ia menceritakan bagaimana ia diculik dan mengalami pelecehan seksual dan bagaimana ia mengelabui penculiknya.

programme.title: Dating App Horrors
programme.desc: Elizabeth Vargas menelusuri industri aplikasi kencan yang sebagian besar tidak diatur dan risiko kencan online, yang dalam beberapa kasus langka menyebabkan penyerangan, pemerkosaan, bahkan pembunuhan.

programme.title: Undercover Asia
programme.desc: Pakistan memiliki populasi terbesar ketiga yang terjerat utang, dan sebagian besar dari mereka berasal dari golongan pemeluk agama minoritas yang terpinggirkan.

programme.title: Undercover Asia
programme.desc: Lebih dari 50.000 pria dan wanita Korea Utara diperlakukan layaknya budak di 40 negara. Sebagian besar gaji mereka diambil paksa dari mereka demi mempertahankan kekuasaan sang Pemimpin Tertinggi.

programme.title: Mark Of A Killer

programme.title: Surviving R. Kelly

programme.title: Elizabeth Shoaf: In A Bunker
programme.desc: Lebih dari satu dekade sejak Elizabeth Shoaf keluar dari ruang bawah tanah di hutan Carolina Selatan. Kini, ia menceritakan bagaimana ia diculik dan mengalami pelecehan seksual dan bagaimana ia mengelabui penculiknya.

programme.title: Dating App Horrors
programme.desc: Elizabeth Vargas menelusuri industri aplikasi kencan yang sebagian besar tidak diatur dan risiko kencan online, yang dalam beberapa kasus langka menyebabkan penyerangan, pemerkosaan, bahkan pembunuhan.

programme.title: Undercover Asia
programme.desc: Meski pemerintah India menegaskan bahwa mereka tidak merekrut anak-anak untuk menjadi tentara, tim Undercover Asia pergi ke hutan-hutan di timur laut India guna mendapatkan bukti nyata yang menguak fakta sebenarnya.

programme.title: Undercover Asia
programme.desc: Min Zayar Oo, seorang fotografer dokumenter yang menetap di Yangon, merekam perdagangan giok ilegal di Myanmar, mulai dari pertambangan di Hpakant hingga ke tangan para penyelundup di perbatasan Tiongkok-Myanmar.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan kecelakaan mobil dan pengejaran tanpa kendaraan di Indiana, serta aksi baku tembak di Carolina Selatan.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan sebuah pengejaran dengan berjalan kaki di Carolina Selatan dan kecelakaan tragis suatu sepeda motor di Arizona.

programme.title: America's Top Dog
programme.desc: Hujan lebat terjadi namun anjing-anjing yang berpartisipasi menunjukkan semangat mereka dengan berjuang melalui cuaca buruk dan terowongan rumit hingga detik-detik terakhir.

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Para petugas mencoba membujuk seorang pria bersenjata untuk menjatuhkan pisaunya, sementara hewan-hewan kabur selama razia pengemudi mabuk dan sebuah pengejaran berkecepatan tinggi di Missoula berakhir dengan tabrakan.

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Seorang polisi menyelamatkan nyawa seorang pengendara motor, sementara Satuan Marinir menyelamatkan tiga bersaudara dari kapal mereka yang terbalik dan seorang petugas tertembak saat bertugas.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: Pada Februari 2008, Christopher Duncan meninggalkan apartemennya di San Antonio, Texas, dan tak pernah kembali lagi. Polisi memiliki sedikit bukti hingga kamera pengawas menunjukkan wajah pembunuh nan berbahaya.

programme.title: 60 Days In
programme.desc: Dengan banyaknya peserta yang telah tersingkir dan peserta lainnya melanggar peraturan, acara 60 Days In di Pusat Lembaga Pemasyarakatan Etowah terancam gagal.

programme.title: Gotti: Godfather & Son
programme.desc: Usai Gotti Senior divonis dan dijatuhi hukuman seumur hidup di penjara, John Junior mengambil alih kepemimpinan dan ia pun langsung menjadi target utama FBI.

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Benjamin Crump dan tim menyelidiki teori tentang seorang anggota geng, Orlando Anderson, yang bertanggung jawab atas pembunuhan Tupac Shakur. Tim melihat rekaman Orlando yang belum pernah dilihat dan meneliti motifnya.

programme.title: Babies Behind Bars
programme.desc: Jeanie melahirkan secara prematur dan harus dilarikan ke RS. Brandi bertemu dengan orang yang mengadukannya dan membuatnya berada dalam masalah. Ibu Stephanie ingin merawat bayinya, Abigail.

programme.title: Border Security
programme.desc: Petugas berwenang menangkap pria yang menipu dua lansia asal Australia untuk menjadi kurir narkoba. Petugas mencurigai seorang pria Tiongkok memakai paspor palsu. Tas tak bertuan menarik perhatian seorang petugas.

programme.title: Border Security
programme.desc: Petugas menemukan sepaket ganja di dalam celana seorang pria di Australia. Seorang penumpang wanita membawa ikan dalam jumlah besar di tasnya. Sebuah paket dari India berisi tas-tas wanita yang penuh dengan narkoba.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Ghost Hunters membantu orang-orang yang menghadapi fenomena supernatural dengan melibatkan ahli forensik, catatan sejarah dan teknologi paling inovatif yang tersedia.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Ikuti tayangan mendebarkan saat departemen kepolisian beraksi: seorang pecandu narkoba yang hidup kembali di Carolina Selatan, anjing yang menggigit pencuri di Florida, dan penggunaan alat kejut listrik di Illinois.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Ikuti tayangan mendebarkan saat departemen kepolisian beraksi, seperti penyerangan seorang polisi di Texas, baku tembak di Arizona, dan aksi kekerasan dalam rumah tangga di Carolina Selatan.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Ikuti bagaimana para dektektif menyelidiki sejumlah kasus pembunuhan dengan menelusuri 48 jam pertama dari investigasi mereka kala mereka mengumpulkan petunjuk, bukti dan wawancara dengan para tersangka utama.

programme.title: Leah R.: Scientology
programme.desc: Scientology telah membeli sejumlah gedung besar untuk digunakan sebagai gereja yang dikenal dengan sebutan Ideal Org. Pihak gereja mengklaim bahwa hal itu menandakan perkembangan pesat dari ajaran Scientology.

programme.title: Cults And Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Pengikut FLDS seperti Norma Richter harus membela diri mereka sendiri saat pemimpin mereka, Warren Jeffs, dihukum atas tindakan kekerasan seksual terhadap anak.

programme.title: Escaping Polygamy
programme.desc: Raymond Jeffs, putra Warren Jeffs, meminta bantuan untuk mengeluarkan saudaranya, Ishak, keluar dari sekte tersebut. Mattie, seorang wanita yang melarikan diri dari FLDS, bertemu kembali dengan ibunya.

programme.title: My Crazy Ex
programme.desc: Ikuti kisah-kisah nyata tentang cinta yang awalnya penuh kebahagiaan dan perasaan berbunga-bunga namun berubah drastis tak terkendali hingga akhirnya pasangan-pasangan ini bertekad untuk mengakhiri hubungan mereka.
